Text:
I have previewed euro-pic screens in the past w/o problems. Today Firefox and Chrome report euro-pic as Attack Pages while IE does not:
Reported Attack Page!

This web page at www.euro-pic.eu has been reported as an attack page and has been blocked based on your security preferences.

Attack pages try to install programs that steal private information, use your computer to attack others, or damage your system.

Some attack pages intentionally distribute harmful software, but many are compromised without the knowledge or permission of their owners.
